bibl.title: Computer-Früchte.
bibl.note: Results of computer-aided analysis of papyrus fragments. - 1. P. E.E.S. [ed.: R. Coles, ZPE 6 (1970) pp. 261-262, fr. 13] = Hom., Il., 6.361-397. - 2. P. Fackelmann 2 [ed.: M. Gronewald, ZPE 28 (1978) pp. 272-273] = Origen, Comm. in Genesim (MPG 12, coll. 68-69). - 3. P. Oxy. XVIII, 2180, frr. 39; 46; 48 (= Pack2 1466) = Soph., O.T. 119-121 (or 1246-1248; 789-800; 1215). - 4. P. Oxy. XXXIII, 2661 and XLII, 3006: cf. Greg. Naz., Contra Jul. Imp. 1 (MPG 35.661); Aesop paroemiae 1.12. - 5. P. Oxy. XLV, 3211, fr. 1 = Theognis, Eleg. 1.827-830 (or later poet quoting Theognis).
